bill.title: Age-appropriate curriculum for students addressing sexual abuse of children (Erin's Law); direct State Board of Education to issue.
bill.description: An Act To Be Referred To As "erin's Law"; To Authorize And Direct The State Board Of Education To Adopt And Promulgate An Age-appropriate Curriculum For Students In Pre-kindergarten Through Fifth Grade Addressing Sexual Abuse Of Children And Training For School Personnel On Child Sexual Abuse; To Establish A Task Force On The Prevention Of Sexual Abuse Of Children Under The Administrative Structure Of The State Department Of Human Services To Recommend Legislation Regarding Cooperation Among State Agencies And Local Government To Prevent Child Sexual Abuse; And For Related Purposes.
